remarks: The properties of a group element's inverse.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Oct-2006.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-Dec-2013.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
grpinv.1 $e |- X = ran G $.
grpinv.2 $e |- U = ( GId ` G ) $.
grpinv.3 $e |- N = ( inv ` G ) $.
grpoinv $p |- ( ( G e. GrpOp /\ A e. X ) -> ( ( ( N ` A ) G A ) = U /\ ( A G ( N ` A ) ) = U ) ) $.
